channel.title: c# on Homepage Jan Baer
channel.description: Recent content in c# on Homepage Jan Baer

item.title: From C# to Python
item.description: Last week I did my first steps with Python and I was really suprised about this programming language that has such a long history. It provides features that I wouldn’t expect. To dive deeper into the language I solved a Kata, what I mostly do when learning a new programming language. This time I choosen the StringCalculator kata from Roy Osherove. You can find the source code on my github page.
